long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flikcer is a web app in the form of a website and chrome extension which aims to resolve epileptic content in videos. Flikcer will provide a measure of how dangerously epileptic a video is, by providing the number of possible triggers for a seizure. It will provide the timestamps for these triggers along with a safer version of the video, free to download.
